lines.text: [Johnson wakes up and hits his head on the berth above]
I'm Paul Pain, the heart throb of millions!
A pain in the neck! Nyuk nyuk nyuk!
Aw, ya shouldn't believe everything ya hear.

[to Larry]
Hey, you! Wake up and go to sleep.

[looking in a cookbook with their monkey Joe on his shoulder]
There's someplace in this book that says how to cook a monkey.
[Joe lightly raps him on the head a few times]
Joe's right, we can't eat the act.

[after the Three Stooges fall out of bed]
Aren't you guys asleep yet?
Certainly, I dreamed we saw a swimmin' pool, so we dove in.
Well, dive back in your berth, or I'll make you dive off this train!

[Looking at the dish of crab]
Well, wise guys, what is it?
